```{r}
# read the dataset
sars <- read_csv("data/sars_2003_complete_dataset_clean.csv") 

# rename the column names with shorter name
sars <- sars %>% rename(
  cases = `Cumulative number of case(s)`,
  death = `Number of deaths`,
  recovered = `Number recovered`
)

# rename some countries name 
sars$Country[sars$Country=="Viet Nam"] <- "Vietnam"
sars$Country[sars$Country=="Hong Kong SAR, China"] <- "Hong Kong"
sars$Country[sars$Country=="Macao SAR, China"] <- "Macao"
sars$Country[sars$Country=="Taiwan, China"] <- "Taiwan"
```
